title: I can't access my replay
body: I got a penta with Jhin and I wanted to save the highlight. I recorded it many times, but it isn't in my documents. Halp.

replies.body: Per the [Replays Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/234965248-Replays-FAQ-Pro-Tips), your highlights should be located here:  C:\Users\\Documents\LeagueofLegends\Highlights.  It certainly sounds like you had a sick play, and I hope you'll be able to locate it!  If you run into any issues though, be sure to report it to the client devs over at the[ client discussion ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion)boards.  Hope that helps!
